title: Sweet Brutality
description: The more she fights me, the more I want her. Itâ€™s that beautiful, sassy mouth of hers. It makes me want to push her to her knees and dominate her, like the brutal savage I am. As a Russian Arms dealer, I should not be ruthlessly pursuing an innocent like her, but that will not stop me. A twist of fate may have brought us together, but it is my twisted obsession that will hold her captive as my own treasured possession. She is mine now. I dare you to try and take her from me.
author: Zoe Blake
